title: Gunman in the Streets (1950 USA / France) Dane Clark, Simone Signoret - Film Noir

sources.title: Gunman in the Streets (1950 USA / France) Dane Clark, Simone Signoret - Film Noir
sources.description: Gunman in the Streets is a French/US-produced 1950 film noir directed by Frank Tuttle and starring Dane Clark and Simone Signoret. The low-budget B-movie was shot on location in Paris, France. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gunman_in_the_Streets Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.
